text: @Liberaler_2024🚨Retail 2024: Top 10 Trends in US Healthcare! 💊💻🔬🌟GenAI & precision medicine are revolutionizing healthcare! 🌱AgeTech is on the rise! 🧠Mental health awareness & "food as medicine" are gaining traction! 🛍️Amazon, CVS, Eli Lilly and Co, Google, Novo Nordisk A/S, Oracle, Walmart are leading the way! 💪🔜What's next for US healthcare in 2024? Check out the latest report by Coresight Research to find out! 📊💻
